scripts.install: mkdir dockervolume && (cd backend && cp example.env .env) && (cd dockerdb && docker build -t database .) && (docker run  --name database -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -v $(pwd)/dockervolume:/var/lib/mysql -d database mysqld --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password) && (cd backend && npm install) && (cd frontend && npm install)
scripts.start:local: npm run start-docker & npm run start-backend & npm run start-frontend
scripts.start:docker: cp example.env .env && mkdir dockervolume && docker-compose up
scripts.seed:db: (cd dockerdb/sql && cat 02-seed.sql | docker exec -i database /usr/bin/mysql -u root --password=123456 resourceplanner)
scripts.install-docker-only: (cd dockerdb && docker build -t database .) && (docker run  --name database -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -v $(pwd)/dockervolume:/var/lib/mysql -d database mysqld --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password)
